title: Improving Python's speed by 40% when running Home Assistant
description: We use Alpine for most of our Containers. It is the perfect distribution for containers because it is small (BusyBox based), available for a lot of CPU architectures, and the package system is slim. Alpine uses musl as their C library instead of the more commonly used glibc.
